mapper.select: SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#empTargetPerformList()*/ T.TARGET_NO , T.EMP_NO , T.TARGET_SALES , T.TARGET_CONTRACT , T.PERFORM_YEAR , T.PERFORM_MONTH FROM TBL_EMP_TARGET_PERFOM T WHERE T.EMP_NO = #{ empNo } AND T.PERFORM_YEAR = #{ performYear } ORDER BY T.PERFORM_YEAR DESC, T.PERFORM_MONTH DESC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#empPerformList()*/ EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_YEAR" , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_MONTH" , SUM(B.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" , COUNT(P.PERFORMANCE_NO) "PERFORMANCE_COUNT" , P.EMP_NO FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE P JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL B ON (P.COLLECT_BILL_NO = B.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (P.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE C ON (C.CHARGE_NO = B.CHARGE_NO) WHERE B.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , P.EMP_NO HAVING EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ performYear } AND P.EMP_NO = #{ empNo } ORDER BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) DESC, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) DESC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#checkedEmpTargetPerformList()*/ T.TARGET_NO , T.EMP_NO , T.TARGET_SALES , T.TARGET_CONTRACT , T.PERFORM_YEAR , T.PERFORM_MONTH FROM TBL_EMP_TARGET_PERFOM T WHERE T.EMP_NO = #{ empNo } AND T.PERFORM_YEAR = #{ performYear } ORDER BY T.PERFORM_YEAR DESC, T.PERFORM_MONTH DESC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectUserPerformDetail()*/ C.CHARGE_NO , C.CHARGE_DATE , O.ORDER_TITLE , B.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE P JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL B ON (P.COLLECT_BILL_NO = B.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE C ON (C.CHARGE_NO = B.CHARGE_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER O ON (O.ORDER_NO = C.ORDER_NO) WHERE P.EMP_NO = #{ empNo } AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM C.CHARGE_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM C.CHARGE_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillMonth }

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectDeptAvgPeform()*/ D.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME , COUNT(CH.CHARGE_NO) "CHARGE_COUNT" , AVG(CO.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE P JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON ( E.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON ( D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE) JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CO ON ( CO.COLLECT_BILL_NO = P.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON (CH.CHARGE_NO = CO.CHARGE_NO) WHERE CO.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND D.DEPT_CODE = #{ deptCode } AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillDate.collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillDate.collectBillMonth } GROUP BY D.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectEmpPeformLastMonth()*/ EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_YEAR" , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_MONTH" , SUM(B.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" , COUNT(P.PERFORMANCE_NO) "PERFORMANCE_COUNT" FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE P JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL B ON (P.COLLECT_BILL_NO = B.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (P.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE C ON (C.CHARGE_NO = B.CHARGE_NO) WHERE B.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND P.EMP_NO = #{ empNo } AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillDate.collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillDate.collectBillMonth } GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE)

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#empTargetPerformListForInsert()*/ T.TARGET_NO , T.EMP_NO , T.TARGET_SALES , T.TARGET_CONTRACT , T.PERFORM_YEAR , T.PERFORM_MONTH FROM TBL_EMP_TARGET_PERFOM T WHERE T.EMP_NO = #{ empNo } ORDER BY T.PERFORM_YEAR DESC, T.PERFORM_MONTH DESC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectDeptPerformList()*/ EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_YEAR" , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_MONTH" , D.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME , COUNT(CH.CHARGE_NO) "CHARGE_COUNT" , SUM(CO.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE P JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON ( E.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON ( D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE) JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CO ON ( CO.COLLECT_BILL_NO = P.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON (CH.CHARGE_NO = CO.CHARGE_NO) WHERE CO.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , D.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME HAVING EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillMonth } ORDER BY D.DEPT_CODE ASC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#empPerformList()*/ EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_YEAR" , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_MONTH" , E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME , J.JOB_NAME , SUM(B.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" , COUNT(P.PERFORMANCE_NO) "PERFORMANCE_COUNT" FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE P JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL B ON (P.COLLECT_BILL_NO = B.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (P.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_JOB J ON (J.JOB_CODE = E.JOB_CODE) JOIN TBL_CHARGE C ON (C.CHARGE_NO = B.CHARGE_NO) JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON (D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE) WHERE B.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND D.DEPT_CODE = #{ deptCode } GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME , J.JOB_NAME HAVING EXTRACT(YEAR FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM B.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillMonth } ORDER BY E.EMP_NO ASC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectPerformForDate()*/ EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_YEAR" , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) "COLLECT_BILL_MONTH" , D.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME , COUNT(CH.CHARGE_NO) "CHARGE_COUNT" , SUM(CO.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE P JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON ( E.EMP_NO = P.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON ( D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE) JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CO ON ( CO.COLLECT_BILL_NO = P.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON (CH.CHARGE_NO = CO.CHARGE_NO) WHERE CO.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' GROUP BY EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) , D.DEPT_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME HAVING EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CO.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillMonth } ORDER BY D.DEPT_CODE ASC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectPerformForDate()*/ T.TARGET_NO , T.EMP_NO , T.TARGET_SALES , T.TARGET_CONTRACT , T.PERFORM_YEAR , T.PERFORM_MONTH FROM TBL_EMP_TARGET_PERFOM T WHERE T.PERFORM_YEAR = #{ collectBillYear } AND T.PERFORM_MONTH = #{ collectBillMonth } ORDER BY T.EMP_NO ASC, T.PERFORM_YEAR DESC, T.PERFORM_MONTH DESC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectProductPerformList()*/ CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE , B.CATEGORY_NAME "REF_CATEGORY_NAME" , A.CATEGORY_NAME , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.PRODUCT_NAME , SUM(CB.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" , PE.EMP_NO FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE PE JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CB ON (PE.COLLECT_BILL_NO = CB.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON ( CH.CHARGE_NO = CB.CHARGE_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER PO ON (PO.ORDER_NO = CH.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER_PRODUCT POP ON (POP.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON ( P.PRODUCT_NO = POP.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY A ON ( A.CATEGORY_CODE = P.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE CB.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillMonth } GROUP BY CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.CATEGORY_NAME , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.PRODUCT_NAME , PE.EMP_NO ORDER BY CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE DESC, P.PRODUCT_NO ASC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectProductPeformForDate()*/ CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE , B.CATEGORY_NAME "REF_CATEGORY_NAME" , A.CATEGORY_NAME , P.PRODUCT_NAME , SUM(CB.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" , COUNT(P.PRODUCT_NO) "CHARGE_COUNT" , P.PRODUCT_NO , PE.EMP_NO FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE PE JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CB ON (PE.COLLECT_BILL_NO = CB.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON ( CH.CHARGE_NO = CB.CHARGE_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER PO ON (PO.ORDER_NO = CH.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER_PRODUCT POP ON (POP.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON ( P.PRODUCT_NO = POP.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY A ON ( A.CATEGORY_CODE = P.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE CB.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillMonth } GROUP BY CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.CATEGORY_NAME , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRODUCT_NO , PE.EMP_NO ORDER BY CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE DESC, P.PRODUCT_NO ASC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectCategoryPerformList()*/ A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME "REF_CATEGORY_NAME" , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , SUM(CB.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" , COUNT(P.PRODUCT_NO) "CHARGE_COUNT" FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE PE JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CB ON (PE.COLLECT_BILL_NO = CB.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON ( CH.CHARGE_NO = CB.CHARGE_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER PO ON (PO.ORDER_NO = CH.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER_PRODUCT POP ON (POP.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON ( P.PRODUCT_NO = POP.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY A ON ( A.CATEGORY_CODE = P.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE CB.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ collectBillMonth } GROUP BY A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME ORDER BY A.CATEGORY_CODE ASC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectRefCategoryList()*/ C.CATEGORY_CODE "REF_CATEGORY_CODE" , C.CATEGORY_NAME "REF_CATEGORY_NAME" FROM TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY C WHERE C.REF_CATEGORY_CODE IS NULL

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectCategoryPerformForDate()*/ A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME "REF_CATEGORY_NAME" , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME , SUM(CB.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT) "COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT" , COUNT(P.PRODUCT_NO) "CHARGE_COUNT" FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE PE JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CB ON (PE.COLLECT_BILL_NO = CB.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON ( CH.CHARGE_NO = CB.CHARGE_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER PO ON (PO.ORDER_NO = CH.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER_PRODUCT POP ON (POP.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON ( P.PRODUCT_NO = POP.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY A ON ( A.CATEGORY_CODE = P.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE CB.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillMonth } GROUP BY A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE , B.CATEGORY_NAME , A.CATEGORY_CODE , A.CATEGORY_NAME HAVING A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE = #{ refCategoryCode } ORDER BY A.CATEGORY_CODE ASC

SELECT /*com.deft.crud.product.model.dao.SalesMapper#selectCategoryPerformDetail()*/ CH.CHARGE_NO , CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE , A.CATEGORY_CODE , PO.ORDER_TITLE , CB.COLLECT_BILL_AMOUNT , EI.EMP_NAME FROM TBL_PERFORMANCE PE JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO EI ON (EI.EMP_NO = PE.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_COLLECT_BILL CB ON (PE.COLLECT_BILL_NO = CB.COLLECT_BILL_NO) JOIN TBL_CHARGE CH ON ( CH.CHARGE_NO = CB.CHARGE_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER PO ON (PO.ORDER_NO = CH.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PURCHASE_ORDER_PRODUCT POP ON (POP.ORDER_NO = PO.ORDER_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON ( P.PRODUCT_NO = POP.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY A ON ( A.CATEGORY_CODE = P.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN TBL_PRODUCT_CATEGORY B ON (B.CATEGORY_CODE = A.REF_CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE CB.COLLECT_BILL_STATUS = '수금' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillYear } AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE) = #{ parameters.collectBillMonth } AND A.CATEGORY_CODE = #{ categoryCode } ORDER BY CB.COLLECT_BILL_DATE DESC
